name: Bonfive
description:
Bonfive

Village, standing in the deep deep forest, is attacked by the evil spirits. There’s nowhere to seek help but from five ancient gods. As a local mage you are in charge to keep the fire on the altars lit for the gods to destroy the dark forces.

Will your village survive this night? The fate of its inhabitants rests on your shoulders. Try to eliminate as many evil spirits as possible by feeding wood to the flame on five ancient altars.

Credits

Kienan: code, assets, asset search, sound design

LoliesAreTheBest: level design, page desing, asset search, sound design

Project GitHub: https://github.com/KienanUnique/Mini-Jam-124-Kitchen-in-the-dungeon-team-project
